attributes.action: Fully rejoin European Union hold a referendum because Brexit stole my future
attributes.additional_details: Rejoining the EU will benefit the UK by restoring frictionless trade, attracting investment, and enabling easier movement for work and study traveling and living in Europe. It would give the UK a stronger voice in European affairs, help address labor shortages, and align regulations with key markets. Economically and geopolitically, closer ties could boost growth, stability, and global influence and rebuild global trust It could improve EU membership also provides access to funding for research
attributes.background: Fully rejoin the eu and hold referendum join back with every thing we had before we could even adopt a dual currency system use the pound and the euro and fully adopt the EES

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727964
